column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Work with me here , Pabu !
#Text=" Mako says : " She 's great !
#Text=But I think it makes more sense for me to go for Asami .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I was talking about a girlfriend for me !
#Text=Leave some ladies for the rest of us !
#Text=" Mako says : " I know , that 's what I thought you meant .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well ... ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't know , Bo .
#Text=It does n't seem like a good idea for you to date Korra .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You just said she was great two seconds ago .
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , Korra is a great athlete and the Avatar and stuff , but I do n't know if she 's really " girlfriend material " .
#Text=She 's more like a pal .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Bro , you 're nuts !
#Text=Korra and I are perfect for each other : she 's strong , I 'm strong ; she 's fun , I 'm fun ; she 's beautiful , I 'm gorgeous !
#Text=Okay , I do n't care what you think , I 'm gon na ask Korra out .
#Text=" Mako says : " Look , it just is n't smart to date a teammate , especially during the tournament .
#Text=Keep your head out of the clouds and your priorities straight , okay ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah , yeah , I know , gah .
#Text=You know what I 'm talking about , Pabu , I 'm talking about real love .
#Text="
